text: Han Dong-hoon (; born 9 April 1973) is a South Korean politician and prosecutor. He was the leader of the People Power Party from July to December 2024. He was the 69th minister of justice from May 2022 to December 2023 during the Yoon Suk Yeol presidency. In April 2025, Han announced his candidacy for President of South Korea in the 2025 snap presidential election. He lost the People Power Party nomination to former Labor minister Kim Moon- soo. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean lawyers Category:Politicians from Seoul
title: Han Dong-hoon
